title: Chrisse Barlap and the Tripower Enigma
description: Chrisse Barlap and the tripower enigma is about three girls who go on an adventure to make their new world, soon they get to know that they are not humans and are different. In their first year itself, they cause havoc and are considered to be dark by everyone. Come join us in their adventures in Chrisse Barlap and the Tripower Enigma
author: Ayushi  Mittal
